recommendations: Improve patch management: Only 4 out of 15 devices are fully patched. Schedule regular patch deployments and address installation errors.
Address low disk space: 4 drives have less than 20GB free. Consider cleaning up unnecessary files or expanding storage.

Monitor hardware lifecycle: 10 devices are suitable for 24+ months, but 5 may need replacement planning.
